One-time or occasional adjustmentsLimited number of usersAdministrator needs full manual controlNo automation required
Automatically grant or revoke licenses according to license sets assigned to user roles
Recurring or large-scale redistribution tasksMedium or large number of usersAdministrator needs automation with predictable outcomesNo manual intervention required during redistribution
html:
Business goal

Way of license redistribution

Use cases

Manually grant or revoke licenses for specific users without automation

Manual redistribution

  • One-time or occasional adjustments
  • Limited number of users
  • Administrator needs full manual control
  • No automation required

Automatically grant or revoke licenses according to license sets assigned to user roles

Role-based redistribution

  • Recurring or large-scale redistribution tasks
  • Medium or large number of users
  • Administrator needs automation with predictable outcomes
  • No manual intervention required during redistribution
